creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: nude woman lying on side with her back to the viewer, looking towards ground; a boy stands, resting his hand on her head, looking towards the same point, behind the woman; another nude figure crawls on all fours at L; foliage and castle in background
marks: Signature and Title ULQ in print: ISB; Title ULQ: S. Iohanes. Crisostm
title: Penance of St. John Chrysostomus
